SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface LogicInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client
public interface LogicInterface
The LogicInterface interface defines the methods for the game logic and interaction.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(String nickname)
      Joins an existing game with the specified nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player joining the game.

    • createGame

      void createGame(String nickname, int numberOfPlayer)
      Creates a new game with the specified nickname and number of players.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player creating the game.
      numberOfPlayer - The number of players for the game.

    • quitGame

      void quitGame()
      Quits the current game.

    • sentMessage

      void sentMessage(String text, String[] receiversNickname)
      Sends a message to the specified receivers.
      Parameters:
      text - The text of the message.
      receiversNickname - An array of nicknames of the message receivers.

    • dragTilesToBookShelf

      void dragTilesToBookShelf(List<Coordinate> chosenTiles, int chosenColumn)
      Drags the specified tiles from the board to the chosen bookshelf column.
      Parameters:
      chosenTiles - The list of coordinates of the chosen tiles.
      chosenColumn - The chosen bookshelf column.
      See Also:
      • Coordinate

    • chosenSocket

      void chosenSocket(int port, String host) throws IOException
      Connects to the game using the specified socket.
      Parameters:
      port - The port for the socket connection.
      host - The host for the socket connection.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • chosenRMI

      void chosenRMI(int port, String host) throws NotBoundException, IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Connects to the game using the specified RMI connection.
      Parameters:
      port - The port for the RMI connection.
      host - The host for the RMI connection.
      Throws:
      NotBoundException - If the specified name is not currently bound.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of a serialized object cannot be found.

    • reConnect

      void reConnect()
      Reconnects to the game.
